publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1652 Sarah Boyack: Clean Up the World—That the Parliament notes the Clean Up the World environmental campaign supported by the United Nations Environment Programme; recognises that this campaign will see around 40 million people in over 100 countries join together on the Clean up the World Weekend from 17 to 19 September 2004 when communities around the world will work to make their local environment a cleaner, healthier place to live; welcomes the positive impact that these actions will have; regrets, however, that there are no activities currently organised in Scotland, and urges Scottish community organisations to get involved and help to clean up Scotland. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*

S2M-1652 Clean Up the World (lodged on 7 September 2004) Mike Watson*, Richard Lochhead*, Alex Neil*, Helen Eadie*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Eleanor Scott*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Maureen Macmillan*, Christine May*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Marlyn Glen*, Margaret Jamieson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1652 Clean Up the World (lodged on 7 September 2004) Karen Gillon*, Patrick Harvie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mike Pringle*, Chris Ballance*, Trish Godman*, Jackie Baillie*, Robin Harper*

S2M-1652 Sarah Boyack: Clean Up the World—That the Parliament notes the Clean Up the World environmental campaign supported by the United Nations Environment Programme; recognises that this campaign will see around 40 million people in over 100 countries join together on the Clean up the World Weekend from 17 to 19 September 2004 when communities around the world will work to make their local environment a cleaner, healthier place to live; welcomes the positive impact that these actions will have; regrets, however, that there are no activities currently organised in Scotland, and urges Scottish community organisations to get involved and help to clean up Scotland. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Mike Watson, Richard Lochhead, Alex Neil, Helen Eadie, Mrs Nanette Milne, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Eleanor Scott, Bruce Crawford, Mr Jamie Stone, Maureen Macmillan, Christine May, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Marlyn Glen, Margaret Jamieson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Karen Gillon, Patrick Harvie, Nora Radcliffe, Mike Pringle, Chris Ballance, Trish Godman, Jackie Baillie, Robin Harper, Susan Deacon*, Pauline McNeill*
S2M-1652 Clean Up the World (lodged on 7 September 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Dr Jean Turner*, Scott Barrie*
S2M-1652 Clean Up the World (lodged on 7 September 2004) Karen Whitefield*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Frances Curran*
S2M-1652 Clean Up the World (lodged on 7 September 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1652 Clean Up the World (lodged on 7 September 2004) Elaine Smith*
